channel.title: CVE Feed for CoolKIt -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CoolKIt -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3130|2024-08-01T19:32:42.974Z -- coolkit -- ewelink%20app
item.description: Hard-coded Credentials in CoolKit eWeLlink app are before 5.4.x on Android and IOS allows local attacker to unauthorized access to sensitive data via Decryption algorithm and key obtained after decompiling app

item.title: CVE-2024-7205|2024-07-31T05:51:03.427Z -- coolkit -- ewelink%20cloud%20service
item.description: When the device is shared, the homepage module are before 2.19.0 in eWeLink Cloud Service allows Secondary user to take over devices as primary user via sharing unnecessary device-sensitive information.
